name: Glitchshot (i_am_my_dog)
description:
Instructions are in game, but anyway controls are:

WASD to move around

Hold SHIFT while moving to sprint

Use LEFT CLICK (MOUSE 1) to shoot

Press G to lag back

Press T to clip through phaseable walls

Press R to reset the level

Press ESC to leave the game

I didn't have any time to work on this until the last week of November (Thanksgiving week), which is why it is kind of unfinished. I'll try to add more features and polish it up when I have time, but I'm submitting it now so I get something in before the deadline. In any case, I hope you enjoy playing the game!
